Sentence.value: An electrocardiogram (ECG) and x-rays (fluoroscopy) may also be used to help with positioning.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: An electrocardiogram (ECG) and [[x-rays|C0043299]] ([[fluoroscopy|C0016356]]) may also be used to help with positioning.

Sentence.value: Some people have chest pain, which may require pain medicine.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Some [[people|C0027361]] have [[chest pain|C0008031]], which may require pain medicine.

Sentence.value: Abnormal findings may indicate the cause of pericardial fluid accumulation, such as: - Cancer - Cardiac perforation - Cardiac trauma - Congestive heart failure - Pericarditis - Renal failure - Infection - Rupture of a ventricular aneurysm
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Abnormal findings may indicate the cause of pericardial fluid accumulation, such as: - Cancer - Cardiac perforation - [[Cardiac trauma - Congestive heart failure - Pericarditis - Renal failure - Infection - Rupture|C0018813]] of a [[ventricular aneurysm|C0392464]]

annotation.surface-form: Cardiac trauma - Congestive heart failure - Pericarditis - Renal failure - Infection - Rupture
